message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can see that you're willing to make a serious offer. However, I need to make a profit, so I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $105.
I appreciate the willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Can you consider that price?
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise a bit more, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $108.
I'm getting close to my limit, but I still think $100 is a fair price. Can you meet me at $100?
